survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with the current workplace lunch program, including meal quality, variety, and convenience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current workplace lunch program?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current workplace lunch program?

questions.question_text: Which of the following lunch options do you typically choose? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure checkboxes are clearly labeled.

script.question_text: Which of the following lunch options do you typically choose? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you use the workplace lunch program?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you use the workplace lunch program?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using the workplace lunch program?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-4 times a week', or '1-2 times a week' in Q3
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with text input for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional text input (single-choice with open-ended follow-up).

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using the workplace lunch program?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-4 times a week', or '1-2 times a week' in Q3

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the food provided in the workplace lunch program?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-4 times a week', or '1-2 times a week' in Q3
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for consistency with Q1.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the food provided in the workplace lunch program?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-4 times a week', or '1-2 times a week' in Q3

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace lunch program? (Open-ended)
questions.client_notes: Allow for detailed feedback. Ensure text box is large enough for thorough responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace lunch program? (Open-ended)

questions.question_text: How important is dietary restriction accommodation (e.g., gluten-free, vegan) in the workplace lunch program?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to gauge priority.

script.question_text: How important is dietary restriction accommodation (e.g., gluten-free, vegan) in the workplace lunch program?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay more for higher-quality meal options in the workplace lunch program?
questions.client_notes: Assess willingness to pay. Use a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay more for higher-quality meal options in the workplace lunch program?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the portion sizes of the meals provided?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-4 times a week', or '1-2 times a week' in Q3
questions.client_notes: Use the same scale as Q1 for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the portion sizes of the meals provided?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-4 times a week', or '1-2 times a week' in Q3

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions regarding the workplace lunch program? (Open-ended)
questions.client_notes: Encourage free-form feedback. Useful for qualitative insights.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions regarding the workplace lunch program? (Open-ended)
